meanings.sent1: The puppy was so lovable that everyone wanted to cuddle with it.
meanings.sent2: The kitten's playful nature made it a lovable pet for the whole family.
meanings.sent3: The lovable teddy bear seemed to wink at me from the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as lovable as a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The lovable character in the movie stole the hearts of the audience.

meanings.definition: Having qualities that make one easy to love.
meanings.sent1: The kind old man was so lovable that everyone in the neighborhood adored him.
meanings.sent2: Her cheerful personality and helpful nature made her a lovable friend to all.
meanings.sent3: The lovable clown at the party had everyone laughing with his silly antics.
meanings.sent4: The lovable teacher's patience was as endless as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The lovable character in the book felt like a dear friend to the readers.
